channel.title: Wrong textures.
channel.description: Yesterday, it was "Could Not Load Library Client", now it's a big bug with textures ! There is blood on npc's clothes and there are missing textures (black&purple)... PLEASE HELP ME !!!! Sorry for my bad english, I'm french !!!!!!

item.title: Wrong textures.
item.dc:creator: ToHa
item.description:
Doesn’t work…
I live in France, maybe I have to wait for the SDK’s bug…
Wait and see…

Read full topic

item.title: Wrong textures.
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
missing textures probably means you need a new graphics card

or try to enable console and type mat_dxlevel 90

Yesterday, it was “Could Not Load Library Client”, now it’s a big bug with textures ! There is blood on npc’s clothes and there are missing textures (black&purple)…
PLEASE HELP ME !!!
